title: gee0765's Author Page
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module ListPages separate="no" order="created_at" prependLine="||~ Page||~ Author||~ Rating||~ Created||~ Comments||"]]
||%%title_linked%%||%%created_by%%||%%rating%%||%%created_at%%||%%comments%%||
[[/module]]

[[collapsible show="+"]]

++ 20 or under
[[module ListPages separate="no" tags="scp, -archived, -in_rewrite -jam-con2021" created_at="last 180 day" order="created_at desc" rating="<=20" prependLine="||~ Page||~ Author||~ Rating||~ Comments||"]]
||%%title_linked%%||%%created_by%%||%%rating%%||%%comments%%||
[[/module]]

++ Low amount of comments
[[module ListPages separate="no" tags="scp, -archived, -in_rewrite" created_at="last 180 day" order="comments" prependLine="||~ Page||~ Author||~ Rating||~ Comments||"]]
||%%title_linked%%||%%created_by%%||%%rating%%||%%comments%%||
[[/module]]

[[/collapsible]]

++ cows: 
[[module ListPages created_by="gee0765" order="created_at" separate="no" perPage="250" tags="bovine" prependLine="||~ Page Name ||~ Rating ||~ Comments ||~ Last Comment ||~ Created ||~ Last Edited ||"]] 
|| %%title_linked%% || %%rating%% || %%comments%% || %%commented_at%% || %%created_at%% || %%updated_at%% ||
[[/module]]
@@ @@
++ not cows (dont read these):
[[module ListPages created_by="gee0765" order="created_at" separate="no" perPage="250" tags="-bovine" prependLine="||~ Page Name ||~ Rating ||~ Comments ||~ Last Comment ||~ Created ||~ Last Edited ||"]] 
|| %%title_linked%% || %%rating%% || %%comments%% || %%commented_at%% || %%created_at%% || %%updated_at%% ||
[[/module]]

++ co-authored pages (epic)
